mapper.select: SELECT r.raw_materials_incoming_date ,r.raw_materials_outcoming_date ,r.raw_materials_num ,r.goods_co2_code ,r.raw_materials_amount ,u.user_id ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_nickname ,u.user_addr ,u.user_phone ,u.user_email ,u.user_birth ,u.point_state ,u.user_join_date FROM raw_materials AS r INNER JOIN user AS u on r.user_id=u.user_id order by r.raw_materials_num
